name: ros-mobile-control-hub
description: A Capacitor-based mobile interface for ROS/ROS2.

scripts.build: echo 'Build script needs to be configured to output to www folder. For now, manually copy files.' && mkdir -p www && cp -R ./*.html ./*.js ./*.css ./*.json ./*.ts services components www/ 2>/dev/null || :
scripts.sync:android: npm run build && npx cap sync android
scripts.sync:ios: npm run build && npx cap sync ios
